content.xhtml:p: If our current is less than our target set Increasing and reset Decreasing
If our current is greater than our target set Decreasing and reset Increasing
If our current is greater than our max set Decreasing and reset Increasing
Timer mechanism, tick should change every 2000ms, leading to a rising edge every 4000ms
If increasing is set increase CurrentGen on every rising edge of Tick
If decreasing is set decrease CurrentGen on every rising edge of Tick
If our current is equal to our max reset Decreasing and reset Increasing
If our current is equal to our target reset Decreasing and reset Increasing
Don't overflow the maximum possible generation
If we're decreasing and we overshot return to our target
If we're increasing and we overshot return to our target
